price: (11) And what will his wealth avail him when he falls?[1938]
arabic: وَمَا يُغۡنِي عَنۡهُ مَالُهُۥٓ إِذَا تَرَدَّىٰٓ
footnotes: [1938]- i.e., when he dies or is destroyed. It can also mean when he falls into the Hellfire.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wamā yugh'nī ʿanhu māluhu idhā taraddā
